name: BurgerStarVR
description:
This game was created for my final year project showing all the technical skills which I have learned through my university life. Hope you guys enjoy the gameplay I'm still surprised its only been about 4 months.

Controls - Oculus Rift Touch

Right Trigger - Select MainMenu Widgets

Right and Left grip buttons - Pickup objects

Hold A - To teleport

Controls - Valve Index

Right Trigger - Select MainMenu Widgets

Right and Left grip buttons - Pickup objects

Hold Right A - To teleport

Controls - HTC VIVE

Right Trigger - Select MainMenu Widgets

Right and Left grip buttons - Pickup objects

Hold Trackpad Up - To teleport
